elves.name: Legolas Greenleaf
quotes: A red sun rises. Blood has been spilled this night.
They’re taking the Hobbits to Isengard!

tools.name: Bow of the Galadhrim
tools.description: A bow gifted by Lady Galadriel, known for its accuracy and power.

tools.name: Elven Daggers
tools.description: A pair of daggers used for close combat.

elves.background_story: Legolas Greenleaf is a skilled elven archer from the Woodland Realm, known for his agility and keen eyesight. He joins the Fellowship of the Ring to aid in the quest to destroy the One Ring.

appearance.description: Legolas is a slender and graceful elf with long, blond hair and keen eyes. He is often seen wearing light, green elven armor, which allows him to move swiftly and silently.

elves.name: Galadriel
quotes: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
May it be a light for you in dark places, when all other lights go out.

tools.name: Nenya
tools.description: One of the Three Elven Rings of Power, also known as the Ring of Water.

tools.name: Phial of Galadriel
tools.description: A crystal phial filled with the light of Eärendil's star.

elves.background_story: Galadriel is the Lady of Lothlórien, one of the most powerful Elves in Middle-earth. She is known for her wisdom and her ability to see into the future. Her realm is a place of peace and beauty, protected by her magic.

appearance.description: Galadriel is a regal and ethereal elf with long, golden hair and a graceful demeanor. She often wears elaborate, flowing robes and a radiant aura that reflects her high status and magical power.

elves.name: Elrond
quotes: The time of the Elves is over. Do we leave Middle-earth to its fate? Do we let them stand alone?
I was there, Gandalf. I was there three thousand years ago...

tools.name: Vilya
tools.description: One of the Three Elven Rings of Power, also known as the Ring of Air.

tools.name: Sword of Elrond
tools.description: A finely crafted Elven sword used during the War of the Last Alliance.

elves.background_story: Elrond is the Lord of Rivendell and a powerful half-elf with extensive knowledge of Middle-earth's history. He plays a crucial role in the formation of the Fellowship of the Ring and in guiding the quest.

appearance.description: Elrond has a noble and dignified appearance, with long dark hair and a calm, commanding presence. He is usually seen in elegant robes that reflect his status as Lord of Rivendell.

elves.name: Arwen Undómiel
quotes: I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.

tools.name: Evenstar Pendant
tools.description: A jewel given to Aragorn as a symbol of Arwen's love and immortality.

tools.name: Hadhafang
tools.description: Arwen's sword, inherited from her father, Elrond.

elves.background_story: Arwen Undómiel is a half-elf and the daughter of Elrond. She is known for her beauty and grace and plays a significant role in the events of the Third Age, particularly in her relationship with Aragorn.

appearance.description: Arwen has an ethereal beauty with long, flowing dark hair and striking features. She is often seen in elegant, flowing gowns that reflect her elven heritage and grace.

elves.name: Thranduil
quotes: Do not speak to me of dragon fire! I know its wrath and ruin.
You have but one question to answer: How shall this day end?

tools.name: Elven Sword
tools.description: A gracefully curved sword used by Thranduil in battle.

tools.name: Elven Crown
tools.description: A crown made of twigs and leaves, symbolizing his connection to the forest.

elves.background_story: Thranduil is the Elven King of the Woodland Realm, known for his pride and isolationist tendencies. He is a powerful leader with a deep connection to the forests of Mirkwood.

appearance.description: Thranduil has an imposing and regal appearance with long, white hair and a distinctive crown made from the forest. He wears elegant armor and robes that reflect his status and his connection to nature.

elves.name: Tauriel
quotes: When did we let evil become stronger than us?

tools.name: Elven Daggers
tools.description: Twin daggers used with great skill in close combat.

tools.name: Bow of Mirkwood
tools.description: A bow used by Tauriel for long-range attacks.

elves.background_story: Tauriel is a skilled elven warrior and the captain of the Elven Guard in Mirkwood. Known for her bravery and strong sense of justice, she plays a significant role in defending her realm and aiding others.

appearance.description: Tauriel is a fierce and capable elf with red hair and a determined look. She is seen wearing practical yet elegant elven armor and is armed with both a bow and daggers.

elves.name: Glorfindel
quotes: I am Glorfindel, who once fought the Balrog and returned from the dead.
I will not leave you, my lord, while there is hope.

tools.name: Sword of Glorfindel
tools.description: A powerful sword used by Glorfindel, notable for its sharpness and strength.

tools.name: Elven Horse
tools.description: An Elven steed that Glorfindel uses, known for its swiftness and grace.

elves.background_story: Glorfindel is a renowned elven warrior of Rivendell who has a legendary past, including his battle with a Balrog and his return to Middle-earth. He is a key figure in defending Rivendell and assisting other Elves.

appearance.description: Glorfindel has a commanding presence with golden hair and a strong, noble appearance. He is often seen with his powerful sword and riding a swift Elven horse.
